name: Based Bonk
description: Based Bonk is a decentralized meme-driven token launched on the Base blockchain. It is designed to promote active community participation, incentivized engagement, and experimental on-chain utility. The project features a local, non-custodial bot suite capable of automating airdrops, volume loops, and liquidity operations. It blends meme culture with technical tools to explore innovative, user-controlled growth dynamics.
